ARABIC: إِنَّ شَرَّ ٱلدَّوَآبِّ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ فَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: The worst of animals in the sight of Allah are those who are kafir and do not have iman,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Verily the worst of creatures in the sight of God are those who deny (the truth), and will not believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Surely the worst moving creatures in the sight of Allah are those who definitively denied the truth and are therefore in no way prepared to accept it;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The most wicked creatures in the sight of God are the unbelievers who never have faith,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed the worst beasts in the sight of Allah are the people who disbelieve and do not accept faith.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, the worst of living creatures before Allah are those who disbelieve, -- so they shall not believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely the vilest of animals in Allah's sight are those who disbelieve, then they would not believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Surely the worst of beasts in God's sight are the unbelievers, who will not believe,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! the worst of beasts in Allah's sight are the ungrateful who will not believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: The worst creatures in the sight of God are those who reject Him and will not believe;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily the vilest of moving creatures with Allah are those who disbelieve-wherefore they shall not believe-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed the worst of beasts in Allah’s sight are those who are faithless; so they will not have faith.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: For the worst of beasts in the sight of Allah are those who reject Him: They will not believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, The worst of moving (living) creatures before Allah are those who disbelieve, - so they shall not believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Indeed, the basest creatures before Allah are the unbelievers for they will not believe;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: The worst of creatures in God's view are those who disbelieve. They have no faith.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, the worst of living creatures in the sight of Allah are those who have disbelieved, and they will not [ever] believe -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [8:55] The following was revealed regarding [Banū] Qurayza: Surely the worst of beasts in God’s sight are the ungrateful who will not believe,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! the worst of beasts) of created beings (in Allah's sight are the ungrateful) Banu Qurayzah and others (who will not believe) in Muhammad (pbuh) and in the Qur'an;
